text:

gcc
  -g -O2    -U__STR__ -D_USE_IRS -D_THREAD_SAFE -DAP_HAVE_DESIGNATED_INITIALIZER

2.0.35/server/mpm/prefork

creator: richard.vandenzel@getronics.com
jwoolley@apache.org
text:
Did you by chance have the LIBS environment variable set prior to running 
configure?

Oh, and as if you couldn't have guessed, from ipcs, the corresponding semaphore:

0x00000000 8781875    root      600        1         

The minimum config seems to be: run Apache as root with User set to some guy 
(jcw5q in my case ;), you *might* need to be in -X mode, and have RewriteLog 
set up and RewriteEngine on and RewriteLogLevel set > 0 with at least one 
RewriteRule, I imagine.  httpd-test's config is sufficient.
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
jwoolley@apache.org
text: Aww MAN, that comment got stuck on the wrong PR.  Sorry about that.

creator: richard.vandenzel@getronics.com
text:
When compiling 2.0.36 we get al little further, but I get stuck on the 
following error:

        /bin/sh /home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=link 
gcc
  -g -O2    -U__STR__ -D_USE_IRS -D_THREAD_SAFE -DAP_HAVE_DESIGNATED_INITIALIZER
 -I. -I/home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/os/unix -I/home/rdz/httpd-
2.0.36/server/mpm/prefork
-I/home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/modules/http -I/home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/modules/proxy -
I/ho
me/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/include -I/home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/srclib/apr/include -
I/home/rd
z/httpd-2.0.36/srclib/apr-util/include -I/home/rdz/httpd-
2.0.36/modules/dav/main -
I/home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib -export-dynamic -Wl,-brtl
-o ab  ab.lo -Wl,-brtl -Wl,-uXML_Parse /home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/srclib/apr-
util/liba
prutil.la  /home/rdz/httpd-2.0.36/srclib/apr/libapr.la /home/rdz/httpd-
2.0.36/srcl
ib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib/libexpat.la
ld: 0711-317 ERROR: Undefined symbol: .sqrt
ld: 0711-345 Use the -bloadmap or -bnoquiet option to obtain more information.

Fixed it by using the GnuCC and the GnuMake provided on the AIX Toolbox for 
Linux Applications for Power Systems CD, instead of the ones you can download 
from Bull's Freeware site.
creator: richard.vandenzel@getronics.com
